forest.title: The Forest
forest.text: You awaken in a dark forest. A few supplies lie near you.

settlement.title: The Village
settlement.text: After leaving the forest, you see a small settlement ahead. It's eerily quiet. What do you do?

choices.text: Sneak in through a break in the walls
Climb a nearby rock to scout it out
Call out and hope for a response

explore.title: Explore Buildings
explore.text: The village is eerily quiet. As you wander, you find three buildings: a red house, a food hall, and a small blue house. What do you check first?

wolf.title: Wolf
wolf.text: As you enter, a loud growl breaks the silence. A wolf appears in front of you with a menacing growl.

fight.title: Fight
fight.text: You decide to stand your ground and fight the wolf.

choices.text: Brandish your new found pocket knife
Grab your walking stick with both hands and take your best batters stance
You have nothing to fight with, imitate a boxer's stance and begin praying

hide.title: hide
hide.text: You try to hide and wait for the wolf to pass.

choices.text: The wolf keeps getting closer, smelling the food you grabbed from the food hall
You steady your breath and since you have no food, the wolf to loses interest and leaves

road.title: The Road
road.text: You managed to survive the encounter with the wolf. You soon wander out onto a road. Where do you go?

choices.text: Take the bridge over the river

win.title: You survived!
win.text: You continue on and notice a new settlement, hearing the distant sound of people. You survived!

lose.title: Game Over
lose.text: Survival was not meant to be. Better luck next time!
